mapper.select: select t.diary_date,t.diary_note from t_oa_top_diary t where t.diary_date = #{params.diaryDate} and t.diary_type = #{params.diaryType} and t.user_id = #{params.userId} and t.type_id=#{params.typeId}
mapper.update: update t_oa_top_diary set diary_note=#{params.diaryNote} where diary_date=#{params.diaryDate} and diary_type=#{params.diaryType} and user_id=#{params.userId} and type_id=#{params.typeId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_oa_top_diary where diary_note is null or diary_note='' or diary_date is null or diary_date=''
